name: Blacklane GmbH
goal: Blacklane is the global premium mobility service. We take stress out of travel across more than 500 airports, 300 cities and 60 countries. We guarantee high-quality chauffeur and airport concierge services at fair, fixed and all-inclusive rates. Book Blacklane on our website or mobile apps or via distribution and channel partners.
euInitiatives: Digital single market for transportation. Ride-hailing, taxi and similar transportation frameworks.
